result.nbt: {CustomModelData:104,modify_damage:1b,Unbreakable:1b,custom_bow:3,display:{Name:'[{"text":"Eater of Worlds","color":"light_purple","italic": false}]',Lore:['[{"text":"You can feel the power of the void when you hold this bow.","italic": false,"color":"dark_green"}]','[{"text":"If an arrow fired from this bow falls to the ground, any creatures around it will take damage.","italic": false,"color":"dark_green"}]']}}
